data.title: Amazon.com: Forza Motorsport 7 – Standard Edition
data.meta_description: Amazon.com: Forza Motorsport 7 – Standard Edition - Xbox One : Microsoft Corporation: Video Games
data.text:
Customers like the quality of the video game. They say it's an incredible, fun, and challenging game that makes them push their skills. They also say the gameplay is good and the game is a major production. Customers also say it’s a great game to play against friends and the new career mode is much more engaging than in previous titles. They mention that the game has a very good job, but it seems like Forza 7 does a better job.

"...This is the best SIM racer I have ever payed and my only statement would be look for a good price for the Ultimate edition if possible...." Read more

"the game is good, every forza besides motorsport 5 was good. played a tiny bit of 6 but never experienced it fully. wish they remastered FM4" Read more

Customers find the graphics of the video game great, incredibly realistic, and beautiful. They also say the game looks amazing on a 4K TV, the cars look and feel very realistic, the night races and weather effects are beautiful, and the game sounds amazing.

"...Visuals are astounding. I've only played it on a 720P, but have a 4K HDR TV lined up for my Xbox and can't wait to see it on there...." Read more

"...WTF Turn 10? The graphics are prettier than ever, and we can't see any of the details of our paint, wheels, etc etc because it's dark in our garage..." Read more

Customers like the value of the physical video game software. They say it's worth the money, and they appreciate that you can use in-game money to purchase them.

"...The new driver gear is cool and I also like the loot boxes. You can use in game money to purchase them and I don’t feel that you have to buy them to..." Read more

Customers like the cars in the video game. They say the huge selection is awesome, with plenty of track variety. They also appreciate the selection of free DLC cars to pick from. Customers also mention that the graphics, sound, and physics are a blast. They love the cars and the level of detail that you can see and feel with. They consider the game a great new addition to the Motorsport series.

"...There's so much variety in this game. Amazing number of different classes of vehicles to race. All the way from big rigs all the way down to ATVs...." Read more

Customers are mixed about the ease of use. Some mention it's easy and challenging, while others say it'll frustrate them to navigate, be extremely complicated, and overwhelming. They also say the cars are difficult to handle.

"...The graphics on the One X look amazing but the game is extremely complicated before you even get behind the wheel...." Read more

"...The menu system and UI are more confusing and slower than the previous game. Some of their UI decision really have me scratching my head...." Read more

Customers are mixed about the sound quality of the video game. Some mention that it has great sound, great selection of cars and tracks, and great music. Others say that the sound goes out every race, there is randomly no audio for the race, and the split screen car sounds don't work.

Customers have mixed opinions about the performance of the video game. Some say the game runs smoothly and is prettier than the demo, while others say it stopped functioning after a month. They also mention that the game will not start and that they have gone away with the test drive function in tuning.

"...And if player two wants to buy a car, you have to restart the game. Nice.....I could go on, but that just makes me sad...." Read more

"...They’ve also gone away with the test drive function in tuning making it for more frustrating to fine-tune your vehicle also there is no more free..." Read more

"...This happened 3 times. The last time it happened, it wouldn't start back up at all. Tried refreshing xbox, tried reinstalling, nothing worked...." Read more
